    #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    #define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
    #define P(x) printf("%d",x)
    #define fl(i , a, b) for(i = a; i<b; i++)
    int a[2000002] , h[2000002]={0} ;
    int main()
    {
        std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
        int t,j,ans,final,i,n,k;
     
        S(t);
        while(t--)
        {
            memset(h,0,sizeof(h));
            S(n);
            final = -1; 
            fl(i, 0 , n)
            {
                S(a[i]);
                h[a[i]]++;
                final = max(final , a[i]); 
            } 
            ans = 1; 
     
            for(int i=2; i<=final; i++)
            {   
                k =0 ; 
                for(j = i ;j<=final ; j+=i)
                    k+=h[j];
     
                if(k>=2) 
                    ans=i;
            }
            printf("%d\n", ans);
        }
        return 0;
    }
